title: Looking for 'Noise' font
content:
Thanks in advance for any help I could get with this. I'm looking for a san serif script font called (I think) 'Noise'. It looks similar to the font on Bjork's Vespertine album. Any leads? I'd love to find something free, if possible, but any sort of direction someone could point me in would be appreciated, free or not!  
Thanks a million...  
Sarah
author: Cyanotype

comments.content:
If you're sure of the font name, use Fontseek ( [www.fontseek.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824122409/http:/www.fontseek.com/ "www.fontseek.com")) to look for sites that have it. The Bjork fonts have frequently been discussed. You can search using Google, with the addition of 'site: www.typophile.com' and Google will find any forum discussions that included your terms.

- Mike Yanega

Where are you going next Yves? We seem to be tracking each other.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks a million... I've spent all afternoon slogging through the various bjork forums for a link to the font, but no luck! I did the search through google though that was suggested, and think I found my answer (although unfortunately not the answer I was hoping for!) Perhaps I'll have to switch directions on the font search and use something different. I'm feeling a bit sheepish about looking for the font in the first place, as I'm fairly certain that the second anyone sees the design they're going to go "Isn't that the font from...". Sigh. I hate it when you know the perfect font for something, but it just won't work...

_It looks similar to the font on Bjorkâ€™s Vespertine album._

Check out Ito from [Kinema Moon](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824122409/http:/www.kinemamoon.com/font.html)

Try also [Digital Kauno](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824122409/http:/www.fenotype.com/) from Fenotype or [Herrliches Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824122409/http:/www.hugohoppmann.com/herrlich.htm) from Hugo Hoppmann for a similar feeling.

\> _Where are you going next Yves? We seem to be tracking each other._

That's why I decided to go to sleep after that. You seemed to have it pretty much covered. No need for me. :^D
